mapper.select: SELECT s.CD_ALLOW , a.NM_ALLOW , a.YN_TAX AS YN_TAX_ALLOW , s.ALLOW_PAY , s.CD_EMP , s.ALLOW_MONTH , s.ALLOW_YEAR , s.PAYMENT_DATE FROM SAALLOWPAY s LEFT OUTER JOIN SAALLOW a ON s.CD_ALLOW = a.CD_ALLOW WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp} AND ALLOW_MONTH = #{allowMonth} AND CD_ALLOW = #{cdAllow}

SELECT s.CD_ALLOW , (SELECT NM_ALLOW FROM SAALLOW s2 WHERE s2.CD_ALLOW=s.CD_ALLOW) AS NM_ALLOW , a.YN_TAX AS YN_TAX , sum(s.ALLOW_PAY) AS SUM_ALLOW_PAY FROM SAALLOWPAY s LEFT OUTER JOIN SAALLOW a ON s.CD_ALLOW = a.CD_ALLOW WHERE 1=1 AND s.CD_EMP = #{cdEmp} AND s.ALLOW_MONTH = #{allowMonth} AND s.ALLOW_YEAR = #{allowYear} GROUP BY s.CD_ALLOW,YN_TAX
